mapper.insert: insert into book_tb(book_id, title, content, author, genre_id, publisher, book_img, create_at) values( 0, #{title}, #{content}, #{author}, #{genreId}, #{publisher}, #{bookImg}, now() )
mapper.update: update book_tb set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, author = #{author}, genre_id = #{genreId}, publisher = #{publisher}, book_img = #{bookImg} where bookId = #{bookId}
mapper.select: select b.book_id as bookId, b.title, b.author, g.genre, b.publisher, b.book_img as bookImg, b.create_at as createAt from book_tb b left outer join genre_tb g on(g.genre_id = b.genre_id) order by createAt DESC
